name: Tricky Tracks
description:
Objective: Keep the train on rails for 60 seconds.

Instructions: Place the rail tracks by "Left clicking" anywhere above the ground where train is touching. To place the rail tracks, you will need metal. Metal can be collected by "Right clicking" anywhere below the ground which is under the train.

1 Metal = 1 Rail track.

Good Luck in your quest of taking the train to the California.
